#summary The Submission element for XForms 1.1

= Introduction =

The submssion component should be enhanced to support the [http://www.w3.org/TR/xforms11/#submit XForms 1.1 spec].

  * xforms-submit-error with context

    * error-type=no-data
    * error-type=validation-error
